greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} k*C(n,k)^2*C(n+k,k)^3, where C := binomial.
link: C. Elsner, On recurrence formulas for sums involving binomial coefficients, Fibonacci Quarterly, 43,1 (2005), 31-45.
program: (PARI) a(n) = sum(k=0, n, k*binomial(n,k)^2*binomial(n+k,k)^3); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 10 2016
xref: Cf. A055246 (indices where not multiple of 3), A112036.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 28 2005
